channel.title: VIII on Home
channel.description: Recent content in VIII on Home

item.title: Tier VIII Light Tanks
item.description: All the graphs are based on battles played during update 6.0 only (not cumulative data). The Best Performing Tanks Relative WR The graph shows Light Tanks by Relative WR. That is the average of players’ WR in a tank compared to their average WR at the tier (in all same tier tanks).

item.title: Tier VIII Light Tanks
item.description: All the graphs are based on battles played during update 6.1 only (not cumulative data). The Best Performing Tanks Relative WR The graph shows Light Tanks by Relative WR. item.title: Tier VIII stats
item.description: This page list statistics of battles fought at tier VIII during update 6.0. Battles per Player Number of battles fought per player during the update 6.0. On average, players played 129 battles.
